title: Every media business becomes an events business
description: The feed is overfed. People want to gather. Everyone (journalists, creators, brands) is getting better at creating content (articles, videos, posts) of all kinds (news, entertainment, advertisements). All this before you consider generative slop filling the cracks. Attention is not enough. Media companies of all sizes need to build worlds. This means an increased appetite...
